__e: For 10 years since the death of your father I... showed you the correct path.
No. I couldn't possibly. It's too special.
You have shown me the way so many times in the past and... now you are making all my dreams come true.
I chose you especially, because i thought you'd enjoy a joke.
I've never shown it to another living soul and I gave it to a stranger.
Actually, that's why you showed it to her, isn't it?
The good Lord has always told me the difference between right and wrong.
We can all be as we were before, now that you have shown us the truth.
So, you must believe in some god or someone or they'd have shown you the door, too.
You may have just shown me a side of you I don't know if I like.
I can hardly believe it myself, but Arthur's shown me a side of him
You know, if you have been different to me lf you had shown me alittle respect.
But at least you have shown me there is truly life beyond death.
Today the Lord has shown me I don't have to do everything on my own.
The only good that came out of all the chaos that I created is that it showed me the one thing I cared about, the only thing I cared about is you, baby.
He didn't show his hand, and I could tell he was nervous.
You seem to forget that I am the only one the Queen has shown her face to since the King's death.
So far, they have welcomed me and given me a rare glimpse into their bizarre way of life.
